name: Egg Shockers 2
description:
Run as much as you can and don´t stop jumping! You will love "Egg Shockers 2" is the Endless Runner reinvented!
Help escape from the tower to our bold character while everything is going down.
Collect as many coins as you can to unlock new costumes to use in the game.
Share your best score with your friends or in our world ranking and presumed to be the number one on You better run!
